name: ALA General
description: The default ALA profile filters out records based on the filter groups outlined below.  This is a moderately restricted set of data.

categories.name: Exclude spatially suspect records
categories.label: spatially-suspect
categories.description: Exclude records with a spatially suspect (geospatial kosher) flag.

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where spatial validity is "false"

categories.name: Exclude records based on scientific name quality
categories.label: scientific-name
categories.description: Exclude records with scientific name related quality assertions

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records with an assertion that the scientific name provided does not match any of the names lists used by the ALA.  For a full explanation of the ALA name matching process see https://github.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/ala-name-matching
Exclude all records with an assertion that the scientific name provided is not structured as a valid scientific name. Also catches rank values or values such as "UNKNOWN"
Exclude all records with an assertion that the name and classification supplied can't be used to choose between 2 homonyms
Exclude all records with an assertion that kingdom provided doesn't match a known kingdom e.g. Animalia, Plantae
Exclude all records with an assertion that the scientific name provided in the record does not match the expected taxonomic scope of the resource e.g. Mammal records attributed to bird watch group

categories.name: Exclude records with additional spatial quality issues
categories.label: location
categories.description: Exclude records with location related data quality assertions

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records with an assertion of the occurence is cultivated or escaped from captivity
Exclude all records with an assertion of latitude value provided is zero
Exclude all records with an assertion of longitude value provided is zero
Exclude all records with an assertion of  latitude and longitude have been transposed
Exclude all records with an assertion of coordinates are the exact centre of the state or territory
Exclude all records with an assertion of  coordinates are the exact centre of the country
Exclude all records where duplicate status is "duplicate"

categories.name: Exclude records based on location uncertainty
categories.label: location-uncertainty

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where coordinate uncertainty (in metres) is greater than 10km

categories.name: Exclude records with unresolved user annotations
categories.label: user-assertions
categories.description: Exclude records with open user assertions

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records with unresolved user  assertions
Exclude all records with unconfirmed  user assertions

categories.name: Exclude records that are environmental outliers
categories.label: outliers
categories.description: Exclude records that are an outlier (not within the expected range) against 3 or more environmental layers according to a reverse jacknife test

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where outlier layer count is 3 or more

categories.name: Exclude records based on record type
categories.label: record-type
categories.description: Exclude environmental DNA and fossil specimen records

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where Record type is "Fossil specimen"
Exclude all records where Record type is "EnvironmentalDNA"
Exclude all records where Presence/Absence is "absent"

categories.name: Exclude records pre 1700
categories.label: dates-post-1700
categories.description: Exclude records with event date pre 1700

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where year is prior to 1700
